# numberOfDigits

**Instance Property**

The number of required digits.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfDigits: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is 4.

## Configuring the Digit Entry View

- **titleText**: The title of the digit entry view.
- **promptText**: A prompt that displays any additional required information.
- **isSecureDigitEntry**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an entered digit is immediately obscured.
